laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for HIV-1, CD4 count of 90 cells/mm3, viral load of 366,000 copies/mL.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: CD4 count increased to 500 cells/mm3 and viral load decreased to 1.6 thousand copies/mL after 8 weeks.

laboratory_examinations.findings: No cells, normal protein content, nonreactive VDRL, Myelin basic protein was 3.0 mg/L.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Comparison with blood showed higher mutation proportion (53% in blood).

laboratory_examinations.findings: Few cytochrome c oxidase (COX)â€“deficient fibers observed.
Bilateral calcification of the lenticular nuclei and cortical-subcortical atrophy, hypoplastic cerebellar vermis.
